pkgmetadata.longdescription: Convert 'ODK' or 'XLSForm' to 'SPSS' Data Frame // After develop a 'ODK' https://opendatakit.org/ frame, we can link the frame to 'Google Sheets' https://www.google.com/sheets/about/ and collect data through 'Android' https://www.android.com/. This data uploaded to a 'Google sheets'. odk2spss() function help to convert the 'odk' frame into 'SPSS' https://www.ibm.com/analytics/us/en/technology/spss/ frame. Also able to add downloaded 'Google sheets' data or read data from 'Google sheets' by using 'ODK' frame 'submission_url'.
